SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
Database
The Database class provides methods to interact with the database for managing users, exams, questions, student exams, student answers, and exam results.
Exam
This class represents an exam in the system.
ExamCreation
The ExamCreation class provides a JavaFX application for creating exams and adding questions to them.
ExamResult
This class represents the result of an exam taken by a student.
ExamResultTest
Unit test class for the ExamResult class.
ExamTaking
A JavaFX application that allows a student to take an exam.
ExamTest
Unit test class for the Exam class.
LoginGUI
A JavaFX application for user login and exam selection.
Questions
This class represents a question in an exam.
QuestionsTest
Unit test class for the Questions class.
StudentAnswer
This class represents a student's answer to a question.
StudentExam
Represents a student's exam record with details about the exam instance.
User
This class represents a user in the system.
UserRegistrationGUI
The UserRegistrationGUI class provides a JavaFX application for user registration.
UserTest
Unit test class for the User class.
